item.title: Embedded views
item.description: Using private tokens # If authentication is required, you need to obtain a token from the REST API and set it within the iframe that will embed the view. Views can be embedded in external websites through iframes. To embed a view, you can use the following URL: {app}.slingrs.io/{env}/runtime/#views/embed/{viewId} For entity views, you need to set the recordId parameter: {app}.slingrs.io/{env}/runtime/#views/embed/{viewId}?recordId={recordId}` When a page is loaded, it requires the token, which should be sent using window messages as follows:
